_comment: This file is the authoritative source of truth for task execution state. The markdown plan file is read-only reference documentation. Use status-cli.js to update task status.

tasks.description: Catalog and assess core documentation files
tasks.notes: Assessed 4 core docs: VISION.md, ARCHITECTURE.md, ORCHESTRATOR.md (KEEP), PLAN-EXECUTION-TRACKER.md (CONSOLIDATE)

Assessed 9 standards files: 5 KEEP (implementation-plan-standards, artifact-type-registry, subcommand-naming, priority-matrix, config-guide), 4 CONSOLIDATE (selection guides for unimplemented commands)
Assessed 45 templates: 2 meta templates, 5 generic templates, 38 implement-* templates. All KEEP - no duplicates or obsolete files found.
Assessed 9 schema files: 5 in docs/schemas/ (artifact output), 4 in scripts/lib/schemas/ (internal validation). All KEEP - no duplicates or inconsistencies found.

tasks.description: Analyze archive directories and identify cleanup candidates
tasks.notes: Analyzed archive directories: 53 plans in archive, 52 output directories. Identified 49 .bak files for deletion and empty 'docs/completed plans/' directory to remove. All archived content has historical value.
Found HIGH duplication in orchestrator docs (3 files, 85% overlap), MEDIUM overlap in migration docs, and 95%+ similarity across 38 command templates (~10K duplicate lines).

tasks.description: Identify outdated documentation requiring update or removal
tasks.notes: Found 8 critical outdated references to deleted files (plan-runner.sh, plan-orchestrator.js, status-manager.js, current-plan-output.txt). 5 docs need immediate updates.

tasks.description: Map plan standards and identify gaps
tasks.notes: Mapped all documents defining plan standards. Authoritative source: implementation-plan-standards.md. Found 15 gaps and 6 conflicts.

tasks.description: Map phase standards and identify gaps
tasks.notes: Mapped all documents defining phase standards. Authoritative source: implementation-plan-standards.md. Found 10 gaps and 3 conflicts.

tasks.description: Map task standards and identify gaps
tasks.notes: Mapped all documents defining task standards. Primary authority: plan-status.json schema. Secondary: implementation-plan-standards.md. Found 10 gaps and 2 conflicts.

tasks.description: Produce comprehensive documentation cleanup action plan
tasks.notes: Created comprehensive cleanup-plan.md with DELETE (49 backup files, 1 directory), ARCHIVE (4 guides), MERGE (orchestrator docs), and UPDATE (8 outdated files) actions

tasks.description: Propose authoritative standards document and hierarchy
tasks.notes: Created proposed-standards.md (unified PLAN-STANDARDS.md specification) and standards-hierarchy.md (authority chain diagram and document relationships)

completionNote: Analysis complete. Downstream cleanup plan (documentation-cleanup.md) has been executed successfully. All identified cleanup actions have been implemented: 49 backup files deleted, 4 guides archived, orchestrator documentation consolidated, outdated references fixed, cross-references added, and unified PLAN-STANDARDS.md created.
